name: trolleybus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a public transport vehicle with rubber tyres that travels along ordinary roads in towns and is driven by electricity supplied from a wire above the road: The trolleybus does not run on tracks.
Spondylolithesis/iStock/Getty Image Plus/GettyImages
